title: League of Legends Set up errors
body:
Just in the past week my league has has some errors within the RADS folder.
I have uninstalled the game and tried to re install it countless number of times and the errors in the photos come up
I can Ignore the first error as you could see but then with the second one it give me no option so I have to cancel the install
The errors say
'Error writing to file C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system\rads_user_kernel.exe.    Verify that you have access to that directory' giving the option to abort, retry or ignore
the only way to move on from that is to ignore then this is where the next one comes up saying
'Error writing to file C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system\system.cfg.    Verify that you have access to that directory' and it gives me two options this time being retry or cancel which is where the set up ends for me because there is nothing I can do from there.
I have looked on the forums and web to try and find solutions but I couldn't find anything with these problems

replies.body: I am having this same problem, have you found out how to fix it yet?

Um, well do you have the access to those directories?

Also those screenshots are illegible.
